Developer documentation¶

View-functions¶

keeper.views.about(request)¶

About page rendering function

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponse
keeper.views.card_take(request)¶

Card using page rendering function. Lets users to take/return keys using their cards. User should be Guard or Admin to enable this method.

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponse
keeper.views.history(request, page_id=1)¶

History page rendering function. Lets users to see history or search through it. For security purposes login is also required.

Параметры:
  • request – request object
  • page_id – page number, influence displaying interval
Результат:

request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:

class:django.http.HttpResponse

keeper.views.index(request)¶

Main page rendering function. Lets users to transfer key to each other. Displays interface with owned keys and a form for key transfer. Login is required.

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponse
keeper.views.login_user(request)¶

Login page rendering function. Lets users to login on the website.

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponse
keeper.views.logout_user(request)¶

Logout function

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:Redirect to login page
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponseRedirect
keeper.views.register(request)¶

Register page rendering function. Lets users to register on the website. Only works on special accounts (as taking by card). This prevents unwanted access to log database.

Параметры:request – request object
Результат:request answer object, contains HTML file
Тип результата:
class:django.http.HttpResponse

Models¶

class keeper.models.CustomUser(*args, **kwargs)¶

User model

Параметры:
  • card_id – Number of card
  • key_tran_last – Number of room, which was offered to receive last. If there is no such, it = -1
  • user_tran_last – Username of user, who offered to receive a key last. If there is no such, it = «никто»
exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class keeper.models.History(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for storing key history

Contains functions to get minute, hour, date and month

Параметры:
  • key – Number of key
  • time_cr – Date of creation
  • user_id – User, who took a key
  • active – State of the key
  • time_back – Date of return
exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Key Keeper
